content: hi am looking for more information on bluethistle

BlueThistle AI offers AI chatbot and automation solutions to empower businesses. They provide three package options: Basic AI Package with a £500 setup fee and £750 optional monthly retainer, Advanced AI Package with a £750 setup fee and £1,200 optional monthly retainer, and a 24/7 AI Support Package with a £1,000 setup fee and £1,500 optional monthly retainer【5†source】. 

For more detailed information, services, and pricing, you can visit their website at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/. If you have specific questions or need assistance with a service, feel free to ask!
how do i book a consultation

To book a consultation with BlueThistle AI, you can visit their Consultation page on their website at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/consultation/ and follow the instructions provided there. If you need any further assistance or have more questions, feel free to ask!

You can reach BlueThistle AI via email at Team@Bluethistleai.co.uk or by phone at +44 7721 843189. Their office hours are Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM and Saturday from 9 AM to 4 PM. For more details, you can visit their website at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/. If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
how long does it take to set this up

The setup time for BlueThistle AI's packages varies:
- Basic AI Package: 2 to 3 weeks
- Advanced AI Package: 4 to 6 weeks
- 24/7 AI Support Package: 6 to 8 weeks
All packages include a follow-up 1 week after delivery【5†source】. If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
